title: Simulation Learning Program for Language Proficiency Improvement Based on Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Utilization Skills and Comprehension of Simple Foreign Language Expressions
context.additional_context: Providing a repetitive learning environment focused on real-life language use scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 200 core daily conversation vocabulary items with 80% accuracy using 10-minute micro-content via VR simulation.
Learners successfully perform micro-learning strategies applied to real-world contexts through weekly mission-based project assessments at least three times
By the end of the learning period, learners achieve a two-level (out of five) or higher improvement in the "communicative fluency" category of the language proficiency self-assessment tool
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
